Rule.Name: Ensure AIDE is installed (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: AIDE (Advanced Intrusion Detection Environment) is not installed, leaving the system without automated file-integrity checks.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Install AIDE to enable regular integrity checking of critical files and directories.

Rule.Name: Ensure filesystem integrity is regularly checked (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The AIDE configuration is not properly set up, risking incomplete integrity monitoring.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure /etc/aide/aide.conf according to policy and initialize the AIDE database.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual configuration required: edit /etc/aide/aide.conf as per security requirements; then run aideinit" ; aideinit

Rule.Name: Ensure cryptographic mechanisms protect audit-tool integrity (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Cryptographic mechanisms are not implemented to protect the integrity of audit tools and configurations.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Implement cryptographic signing or other integrity measures for audit tools and configuration files as supported by your environment.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual configuration required: implement cryptographic integrity measures for audit tools per policy"
